title: Installation issue:  llvm
body:
<!-- Thanks for taking the time to report this build failure. To proceed with the report please:

1. Title the issue "Installation issue: <name-of-the-package>".
2. Provide the information required below.

We encourage you to try, as much as possible, to reduce your problem to the minimal example that still reproduces the issue. That would help us a lot in fixing it quickly and effectively! -->

### Steps to reproduce the issue

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
```console
$ spack install llvm
...
```

### Information on your system

<!-- Please include the output of `spack debug report` -->

[user@fba5953347c7 /]$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.15.4
* **Python:** 3.8.5
* **Platform:** linux-mageia8-skylake

<!-- If you have any relevant configuration detail (custom `packages.yaml` or `modules.yaml`, etc.) you can add that here as well. -->

  python:
    version: [3.7.8, 3.8.6]



### Additional information

<!-- Please upload the following files. They should be present in the stage directory of the failing build. Also upload any config.log or similar file if one exists. -->

1 error found in build log:
     263            Interpreter: Cannot run the interpreter "/usr/bin/python3.8
            "
     264    
     265    CMake Warning at CMakeLists.txt:702 (message):
     266      Python3 not found, using python2 as a fallback
     267    
     268    
  >> 269    CMake Error at /opt/spack/linux-mageia8-broadwell/gcc-10.2.0/cmake-
            3.18.4-jgax4iym3sgoi5b6uhrvlphwzbdgutym/share/cmake-3.18/Modules/Fi
            ndPackageHandleStandardArgs.cmake:165 (message):
     270      Could NOT find Python2 (missing: Python2_EXECUTABLE Interpreter)
     271    
     272          Reason given by package:
     273              Interpreter: Wrong major version for the interpreter "/op
            t/spack/linux-mageia8-broadwell/gcc-10.2.0/python-3.7.8-hpqdyg2lmiy
            dke4odop3ftii4mh622x6/bin/python"
     274    
     275    Call Stack (most recent call first):


[spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5472500/spack-build-env.txt)
[spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5472501/spack-build-out.txt)

I'm installing with a system /usr/bin/python-3.8 and there may be confusion between the system python and the spack python which is version 3.7.  Installing both 3.7 and 3.8 does not help.

@naromero77  @trws
